org.spongepowered.api.text.transform

Class SimpleTextTemplateApplier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.text.transform.SimpleTextTemplateApplier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextElement, TextRepresentable, TextTemplateApplier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessageEvent.DefaultBodyApplier, MessageEvent.DefaultHeaderApplier

    public class SimpleTextTemplateApplier
extends Object
implements TextTemplateApplier
    A basic implementation of TextTemplateApplier backed by a HashMap and an empty TextTemplate by default.
